<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/block/{blockHeight}/history/{mapping}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns block history for the specified mapping

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"blockHeight","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer"}},{"name":"mapping","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","enum":["bonded","delegated","metadata","unbonding","withdraw"]}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  label={undefined}
